tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ResearchImpactData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
  study_title VARCHAR(100),
  vulnerable_population VARCHAR(50),
  impact_score INT,
  study_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
   study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   study_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   study_description TEXT,
   research_area VARCHAR(50),
   vulnerable_population BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE research_results (
   result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   study_id INT,
   result_description TEXT,
   result_date DATE,
   result_analysis TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES research_studies(study_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchStudies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_title VARCHAR(255),
    study_description TEXT,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_title VARCHAR(255),
    study_description TEXT,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    research_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerable_populations (
    population_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    population_name VARCHAR(100),
    population_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE study_participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(100),
    participant_age INT,
    participant_gender VARCHAR(10),
    study_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES research_studies(study_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_findings (
    finding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    finding_description TEXT,
    study_id INT,
    research_method VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES research_studies(study_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_title VARCHAR(100),
    study_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchImpact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    population_id INT,
    impact_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    impact_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_report TEXT,
    result_score FLOAT
);
